mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER (USER_PK, USER_NAME, USER_PASSWORD, USER_ID, USER_EMAIL, USER_TEL, ROLE_ID) VALUES (UUID(), #{userName}, #{userPassword}, #{userId}, #{userEmail}, #{userTel}, #{roleId})
mapper.select: SELECT u.USER_PK as userPk, u.USER_NAME as userName, u.USER_PASSWORD as userPassword, u.USER_ID as userId, u.USER_EMAIL as userEmail, u.USER_TEL as userTel, r.ROLE_NAME as roleName FROM USER u LEFT JOIN ROLE r ON u.ROLE_ID = r.ROLE_ID WHERE u.USER_ID = #{userId}
